org.microbean.configuration.api

Class Configurations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microbean.configuration.api.Configurations

  • public abstract class Configurations
extends Object
    A single source for configuration values suitable for an application.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson
    See Also:
    getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Logger logger
      A Logger for this Configurations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Configurations()
      Creates a new Configurations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Logger createLogger()
      Returns a Logger for use by this Configurations implementation.
      abstract Map<String,String> getConfigurationCoordinates()
      Returns a Map of configuration coordinates—aspects and their values that define a location within which requests for configuration values may take place.
      abstract Set<Type> getConversionTypes()
      Returns a non-null, immutable Set of Types representing all the types to which String-typed configuration values may be converted by this Configurations object.
      String getValue(Collection<String> names)
      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, or null.
      <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names, Class<T> type)
      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type, or null.
      <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names, Class<T> type, String defaultValue)
      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type, or the supplied defaultValue.
      String getValue(Collection<String> names, String defaultValue)
      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, or the supplied defaultValue.
      <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names, Type type)
      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type, or null.

      <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names, Type type, String defaultValue)

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and name, or null.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and names, or the supplied defaultValue if null would otherwise be returned, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and name, or the supplied defaultValue if null would otherwise be returned.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and names, or the supplied defaultValue if null would otherwise be returned, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property with the supplied name.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied name, converted, if possible, to the supplied type.

      Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied name, or the supplied defaultValue if otherwise null would be returned, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type.
      static Configurations newInstance()
      Returns a Configurations implementation found using the standard ServiceLoader mechanism.

      • logger

        protected final Logger logger
        A Logger for this Configurations.

        This field is never null.

        See Also:
        createLogger()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Configurations

        protected Configurations()
        Creates a new Configurations.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the createLogger() method returns null
        See Also:
        createLogger()

    • Method Detail

      • createLogger

        protected Logger createLogger()
        Returns a Logger for use by this Configurations implementation.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Returns:
        a non-null Logger

      • getConversionTypes

        public abstract Set<Type> getConversionTypes()
        Returns a non-null, immutable Set of Types representing all the types to which String-typed configuration values may be converted by this Configurations object.

        This method never returns null.

        Returns:
        a non-null, immutable Set of Types
        See Also:
        TypeLiteral

      • getConfigurationCoordinates

        public abstract Map<String,String> getConfigurationCoordinates()
        Returns a Map of configuration coordinates—aspects and their values that define a location within which requests for configuration values may take place.

        Implementations of this method may return null.

        Returns:
        a Map of configuration coordinates; may be null

      • getValue

        public final String getValue(String name)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property with the supplied name.

        This method may return null.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final String getValue(String name,
                             String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property with the supplied name, or the supplied defaultValue if otherwise null would be returned.

        This method may return null.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value to return if otherwise null would be returned; may be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final String getValue(Map<String,String> configurationCoordinates,
                             String name)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and name.

        This method may return null.

        Parameters:
        configurationCoordinates - a Map representing the configuration coordinates in effect for this request; may be null
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

                             String name,
                             String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and name, or the supplied defaultValue if otherwise null would be returned.

        This method may return null.

        Parameters:
        configurationCoordinates - a Map representing the configuration coordinates in effect for this request; may be null
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value to return if otherwise null would be returned; may be null

        the configuration value, or null

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(String name,
                            Class<T> type)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied name, converted, if possible, to the supplied type.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        type - a Class representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(String name,
                            Class<T> type,
                            String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied name, converted, if possible, to the supplied type.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the configuration property for which a value will be returned; must not be null
        type - a Class representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value that will be converted and returned if null would otherwise be returned; may be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, String, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final String getValue(Map<String,String> configurationCoordinates,
                             Collection<String> names,
                             String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and name, or the supplied defaultValue if null would otherwise be returned.

        This method may return null.

        Parameters:
        configurationCoordinates - a Map representing the configuration coordinates in effect for this request; may be null
        names - names of configuration properties for which a value will be returned; each element will be tried in turn; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value that will be returned if null would otherwise be returned; may be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name or type is null
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names,
                            Class<T> type,
                            String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type, or the supplied defaultValue.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        names - names of configuration properties for which a value will be returned; each element will be tried in turn; must not be null
        type - a Class representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value that will be converted and returned if null would otherwise be returned; may be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or the supplied defaultValue
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if names or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, Collection, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names,
                            Type type)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type, or null.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        names - names of configuration properties for which a value will be returned; each element will be tried in turn; must not be null
        type - a Type representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if names or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, Collection, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(Collection<String> names,
                            TypeLiteral<T> typeLiteral)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied names, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied typeLiteral, or null.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        names - names of configuration properties for which a value will be returned; each element will be tried in turn; must not be null
        typeLiteral - a TypeLiteral representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, Collection, Type, String)

      • getValue

        public final <T> T getValue(Map<String,String> configurationCoordinates,
                            Collection<String> names,
                            Class<T> type,
                            String defaultValue)
        Returns a configuration value corresponding to the configuration property suitable for the supplied configurationCoordinates and names, or the supplied defaultValue if null would otherwise be returned, converted, if possible, to the type represented by the supplied type.

        This method may return null.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which a String-typed configuration value should be converted
        Parameters:
        configurationCoordinates - a Map representing the configuration coordinates in effect for this request; may be null
        names - names of configuration properties for which a value will be returned; each element will be tried in turn; must not be null
        type - a Class representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null
        defaultValue - the value that will be converted and returned if null would otherwise be returned; may be null
        Returns:
        the configuration value, or null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name or type is null
        ConversionException - if type conversion could not occur for any reason
        AmbiguousConfigurationValuesException - if two or more values were found that could be suitable
        See Also:
        getValue(Map, Collection, Type, String)

      • getValue

        typeLiteral - a TypeLiteral representing the type to which the configuration value will be converted; must not be null

      • newInstance

        public static final Configurations newInstance()
        Returns a Configurations implementation found using the standard ServiceLoader mechanism.

        The first entry in the first classpath resource named META-INF/services/org.microbean.configuration.api.Configurations will be treated as a class name, loaded and instantiated, and returned.

        Returns:
        a non-null Configurations instance
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if there was no implementation found
        See Also:
        ServiceLoader
